special_text:
[+2]: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain trample and haste until end of turn.
[-1]: Create a 1/1 red Bard creature token with prowess. If you’ve put a counter on a Saga this turn, create two of those tokens instead.
[-4]: Untap up to two creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
